----

Description: This modern piece has all the elements. Sex appeal, style, and fun. This twisted cord patterned dress features illusion bodice with plunging neckline and sheer back. The skirt flows to the knees where a sheer panel extends to the bottom. The look is completed with a thin belted waist.
